00214| ---Calculate statistics for reverted messages and tool calls
00215| ---@param messages Message[] All messages in the session
00216| ---@param revert_index number Index of the message where revert occurred
00217| ---@param revert_info SessionRevertInfo Revert information
00218| ---@return {messages: number, tool_calls: number, files: table<string, {additions: number, deletions: number}>}
00219| function M._calculate_revert_stats(messages, revert_index, revert_info)
00220|   local stats = {
00221|     messages = 0,
00222|     tool_calls = 0,
00223|     files = {}, -- { [filename] = { additions = n, deletions = m } }
00224|   }
00225| 
00226|   for i = revert_index, #messages do
00227|     local msg = messages[i]
00228|     if msg.info.role == 'user' then
00229|       stats.messages = stats.messages + 1
00230|     end
00231|     if msg.parts then
00232|       for _, part in ipairs(msg.parts) do
00233|         if part.type == 'tool' then
00234|           stats.tool_calls = stats.tool_calls + 1
00235|         end
00236|       end
00237|     end
00238|   end
00239| 
00240|   if revert_info.diff then
00241|     local current_file = nil
00242|     for line in revert_info.diff:gmatch('[^\r\n]+') do
00243|       local file_a = line:match('^%-%-%- ([ab]/.+)')
00244|       local file_b = line:match('^%+%+%+ ([ab]/.+)')
00245|       if file_b then
00246|         current_file = file_b:gsub('^[ab]/', '')
00247|         if not stats.files[current_file] then
00248|           stats.files[current_file] = { additions = 0, deletions = 0 }
00249|         end
00250|       elseif file_a then
00251|         current_file = file_a:gsub('^[ab]/', '')
00252|         if not stats.files[current_file] then
00253|           stats.files[current_file] = { additions = 0, deletions = 0 }
00254|         end
00255|       elseif line:sub(1, 1) == '+' and not line:match('^%+%+%+') then
00256|         if current_file then
00257|           stats.files[current_file].additions = stats.files[current_file].additions + 1
00258|         end
00259|       elseif line:sub(1, 1) == '-' and not line:match('^%-%-%-') then
00260|         if current_file then
00261|           stats.files[current_file].deletions = stats.files[current_file].deletions + 1
00262|         end
00263|       end
00264|     end
00265|   end
00266| 
00267|   return stats
00268| end

state.current_message = msg

    if not state.current_model and msg.info.providerID and msg.info.providerID ~= '' then
      state.current_model = msg.info.providerID .. '/' .. msg.info.modelID
    end

    if msg.info.tokens and msg.info.tokens.input > 0 then
      state.tokens_count = msg.info.tokens.input
        + msg.info.tokens.output
        + msg.info.tokens.cache.read
        + msg.info.tokens.cache.write
    end

    if msg.info.cost and type(msg.info.cost) == 'number' then
      state.cost = msg.info.cost
    end

    if session.revert and session.revert.messageID == msg.info.id then
      ---@type {messages: number, tool_calls: number, files: table<string, {additions: number, deletions: number}>}
      local revert_stats = M._calculate_revert_stats(state.messages, i, session.revert)
--

    for j, part in ipairs(msg.parts or {}) do
      M._current = { msg_idx = i, part_idx = j, role = msg.info.role, type = part.type, snapshot = part.snapshot }
      M.output:add_metadata(M._current)

      if part.type == 'text' and part.text then
        if msg.info.role == 'user' and part.synthetic ~= true then
          state.last_user_message = msg
          M._format_user_message(vim.trim(part.text), msg)
        elseif msg.info.role == 'assistant' then
          M._format_assistant_message(vim.trim(part.text))
        end
--
    end

    if msg.info.error and msg.info.error ~= '' then
      M._format_error(msg)
    end
--
